overview: “Skee Zhang is a Managing Director of Sequoia Capital China focusing on growth capital investment. Prior to joining Sequoia Capital China in 2007, Skee worked with Baring Private Equity Asia in Hong Kong and Shanghai, and Doughty Hanson in London, where he made investments including Alphamosaic (sold to Broadcom) and Minth (SEHK: 0425). Prior to joining private equity, Skee worked for Deutsche Bank where he advised international companies in their IPO, block trade, debt and convertible bond offerings. Skee has a B.S. from Shanghai Jiao Tong University, an M.S. from University of Minnesota and an M.B.A. from Wharton.” (Source: Sequoia Capital)
